meanings.sent1: She dived into the pool with a big splash.
meanings.sent2: He dived off the diving board gracefully.
meanings.sent3: The dog dived into the lake to fetch the ball.
meanings.sent4: Her mind dived into the depths of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The memory of her first dive dived into her thoughts unexpectedly.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, she dived into the pool for practice.
meanings.sent2: He dived into the ocean during his vacation.
meanings.sent3: The cat dived into the box of toys and made a mess.
meanings.sent4: His grades dived after he stopped studying.
meanings.sent5: The sun dived below the horizon, painting the sky in hues of orange and pink.
